pages.text: The Induction Providers are used in the $(l:multiblocks/induction_matrix)Induction Matrix$(/l) to determine how fast it is able to output energy through the Induction Port.$(2br)Using multiple Induction Providers in the same Induction Matrix will add extra output capacity, by adding their values together.$(2br)The total output value is for the entire multi-block structure, and not on a "per port" basis.
